title: WATCH: Jon Driscoll & Terry Gibson discuss La Liga January transfers
description: Will Real Madrid and Barcelona be busy during the January transfer window? Will there be many other moves in La Liga?
content: Sky Sports Spanish football experts Jon Driscoll and Terry Gibson have been discussing all the expected dealings over the next month.There's talk about Barcelona's plans, whether Atletico Madrid will sell after the arrivals of Diego Costa and Vitolo, and Steven N'Zonzi's next move.Driscoll and Gibson also run the rule over Real Sociedad's Willian Jose and pick out potential bargain signings from La Liga.Hit play on the video at the top of the page to watch the La Liga transfer update.
